CustomField.description: First name / last name / title, suitable for describing this contact at community sites
CustomField.formula: TRIM( IF(NOT(ISBLANK(FirstName)), FirstName & " ", "") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(LastName)), LastName & " ", "") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Title)), "(" & TRIM(Title) & ") ","") )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: First name / last name / title, suitable for describing this contact at community sites
CustomField.label: Description GM
